::DevilDuer::

DevilDuer looks at Scorpina. "Zardus? Well... He's big, and smart I 
think. At least he's taken the Alliance a long way from when they 
began."

He looks aread of himself, shrugging. "I can't really describe him. 
You'll see him soon though."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Jonathan Hogan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> {Scorpina}
> 
>     Following Scorpina changed, her scorpion form scuttling along 
behind the
> bot, her barbed tail weaving back and forth with her movements. 
"Scorpinas
> the name. Zardus is the leader of your bunch? What's he like?"
